alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 2:56PM MDT until October 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western and Central Chaffee County below 11000 feet, Western Mosquito Range and East Chaffee County Above 9000 Feet, La Garita Mountains and Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, including over Wolf Creek Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft
